title: My First Blog Post
content:
Welcome to my blog! This is an example of a blog post with an `inline code` example and a code block below.
```js
console.log('Hello, world!');
```

title: Another Post
content:
Here's another post. You can continue writing more posts in this JSON file.

Just use backticks for `inline code` and triple backticks for code blocks.
```js
function add(a, b) { return a + b; }
```
